thread.title: Gary Lineker leads Twitter plaudits to Lincoln City after FA Cup giant killing at Burnley
thread.title_full: Gary Lineker leads Twitter plaudits to Lincoln City after FA Cup giant killing at Burnley

author: Mirror Football
title: Gary Lineker leads Twitter plaudits to Lincoln City after FA Cup giant killing at Burnley
text:
Sport Gary Lineker leads Twitter plaudits to Lincoln City after FA Cup giant killing at Burnley Raggett's late header won it for the minnows as their amazing run in the FA Cup continued and Twitter went into meltdown Share Lincoln team celebrate their FA Cup record breaking win (Photo: Getty Images)   Thank you for subscribing!   
Lincoln City made FA Cup history as they became the first non-league side to reach the FA CUp quarter-final in 103 years. 
Sean Raggett's late header won it for the Imps at Turf Moor as they continued their fairytale cup run with a late victory at Burnley . 
The Clarets had lost just three times so far at home this season, but became Lincoln's latest giant killing victims . 
Raggett's late header won it for the minnows as their amazing run in the FA Cup continued, and they made FA Cup history in the process, becoming the first non-league team into the last 16 for 103 years. 
And Twitter went into meltdown with love for the non-league Imps, with Gary Lineker leading the plaudits for Danny Cowley's heros... poll loading Can Lincoln WIN the FA Cup? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
